alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:42PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS NEAR AND WEST OF DILKON THROUGH 415 PM MST... At 341 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castle Butte, or 25 miles northeast of Winslow, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dilkon, Tees Toh, Cedar Springs, Castle Butte, and Seba Dalkai. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 366 and 387. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
